page.title: 12FARMING
page.content: There are a number of farms within the area, incorporating arable, mixed and dairy farms. The main dairy cattle bred in the area are Fresians and Dairy Shorthorns with between 300 and 500 head of cattle per farm. The crops grown include sugar beet,potatoes, oil seed rape, wheat and barley. The four farmers interviewed for this project work nearly 1700 acres of land but they only employ 16 men. All the farms have been in existence for many years, indeed some of the farm houses are over 200 years old.
